item.title: S4 Classes in R with Fire Emblem Heroes Data
item.description: Introduction Following my last few posts, in this entry weâ€™ll again work with Fire Emblem Heroes data but on the subject of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in R. R has been described before as being a bit awkward with respect to OOP, with 3 different types of class systems: S3, S4 and RC. In this quick post, we will focus on S4 classes and use them to build a generic character class.
